attributes.action: If no deal for exiting the EU agreed by 10 March, Article 50 be withdrawn
attributes.additional_details: We have run out of whatever time was available to us, and should not see economy or society damaged because the result is either unattainable or denied due to the inability of the politicians to make it possible.
attributes.background: To leave without a deal would be disastrous for this country. So far no deal  will make our lives better than the arrangement that we have now, and in fact none are acceptable to parliament. As we stand to lose seriously by the end of March, we should halt the entire process.
